website_summaries.verdict: These planes, designed to spin and do tricks, would be good for a child who loves a stomp rocket, but wants to do some more interesting things.
pros: Angle of the launch can be adjusted
Adults and kids will enjoy it
Kids tend to play with this for a long time
cons: You will need a large open area for this toy

customer_reviews.title: Most fun we had with all the Christmas Gifts this year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my 5-year-old nephew. Of all the gifts he received on Christmas Morning, this one got the most play. He and the adults in the family spend hours in the front yard stomping on the launcher, having contests to see who could launch one farther, higher, or with the most spins. It was absolutely a blast. That's pretty impressive for a non-electronic, fairly inexpensive toy. I didn't think kids these days would play with something that didn't hook to the internet or have electronic games on it. This toy definitely proved me wrong. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ausrere

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. These are not incredibly durable... but it's soft foam, so that's expected. In the beginning, they kept on flying in loops and crashing too rapidly, but after everyone got a hang of how to launch them, we were able to make them do all sorts of things, even glide in the air for a considerable distance. These things turned out to be more fun than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This item states between the ages of 5+ but my 3 year old grandson and 2 year old grandson played with this toy all afternoon. They both ran around, laughed and had the best time. Each took turns using it. The darts are so soft you don't have to be afraid it would hurt anyone. The 3 year old really shot the dart up high and screamed after each shot but the 2 year old would jump on the cushion and his little dart only went about a foot from where he stood. He was so happy, clapping his hands and laughing you would have thought it went as high as the 3 year old. I love this toy.
customer_reviews.author: shops too much

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: These stomp rockets are really fun!!! Having 3 different types gives you some variety & excitement. I appreciate toys that inspire ACTUAL PLAY and gets the kids playing together outside. I enjoyed these just as much as the kids they were purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it!  Plane wings are somewhat delicate
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the winning present at my nephew's birthday party, one child would stomp and the others would try to catch the plane! Great for getting them outside! Only issue was that one of the wings got torn when the first plane was being put on the stand (luckily it comes with 3 planes!), you just need to make sure the kids handle the planes by the body and not the wings!
customer_reviews.author: Klaubs

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: They really don't launch that far. Kids had fun until a couple of the wings started ripping and eventually fell off. Down to one rocket that works.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Walton

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for an 8-year-old.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I received a video from his mom so I could see him playing with it for the first time. He loved it! It looked like so much fun! He's 8 years old, by the way, and was really happy with his gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Family fun and bonding!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our seven year old nephews Christmas. He loved it! He wanted to play with it right away, since he was flying back to WA state it was easy to take back since it didn’t have and engine or fuel. It is a great introduction o rockets for him. It ended up being fun for the entire family.
customer_reviews.author: AKFurgison

customer_reviews.title: Major disappointment relative to the original toy
customer_reviews.text: Stomp rockets are a stroke of genius. My grand kids, nephews, nieces and ME all love to play with them. However, these "planes" (since they have wings) are a major disappointment. They fly about 1/5 of the distance of the "rockets" and usually nose dive into the ground. Trying to reshape the wings helped slightly. But to call these "stunt planes" is a misnomer. They are closer to "really really bad gliders". After playing with them once, my grand kids have put them away -- preferring much more to use the original rockets.
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you like smashed boxes
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my two little grandson's birthdays. Both boxes arrived totally smashed; NOT IN GIFTABLE CONDITION!! And, no time to return so I had to give the presents as is---SO DISAPPOINTING.
customer_reviews.author: cards&crafts

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Old enough for a two year old to get the hang of. We LOVED it! It’s a lot of fun to jump and stomp on the rocket launcher! It’s hilarious watching them figure out where it went when it flies in the air. After a lot of usage though (and throwing it into water 🤦🏾‍♀️ ) There was one rocket that lost half a wing. It was an old one anyhow. Still have the new ones that are holding up. Easy to assemble. Just pull it out the box and attach the black tube. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Anything that involves the word “stomp” and doesn’t lead to trouble has the unbridled attention of a six year old boy. Stomp Rocket achieved this with my six year nephew, his brothers, and their young-at-heart father. It makes a great gift if one wants to maintain the title of cool uncle.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Mason

customer_reviews.title: It's simplistically pretty cool!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my sons 5th birthday, it was packaged well and arrived as promised. Assembly was a breeze as there's only a few parts. It comes with 3 planes, two did some pretty fancy loopty loops while the third was intent on a one trick maneuver. We're not always the best at keeping toy parts together so I was pleased to see that you can order the planes separately if they get lost or broken, since they're made of foam. All in all I would say it was a success. The birthday boy was happy and it kept him busy and held his attention for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: No batteries and kids go OUTSIDE
customer_reviews.text: If you're tired of your kid always asking for tablet/phone to play with instead of going outside like kids should this is the toy for you. Kids today suffer from tech overload so they are easily bored with traditional games if they already got spoiled by tech. Sadly lot can't handle biking for a long time due to a sedentary lifestyle. This is a great toy if you'd like them to get their butt off the couch and in the sun. No batteries required and it goes at their pace. This toy deserves a prize!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bequette

customer_reviews.title: It goes up in the air in 10 feet and comes down in about 2 seconds
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toy for our 5 year old as the weather is getting nicer. Over the weekend, we took the toy out for a spin in a local park. Boy, were we disappointed. After setting everything up, the kid jumped on it super excited, and the plane went up in the air and plop down on the ground in less than 2 seconds. We tried different planes and different angles, and the result was the same. I even jumped onto it thinking the kid might not have enough weight behind him, and it was a little better (3 seconds maybe?) For something that's $30, it's really not worth it. We are returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Hai

customer_reviews.title: Grand Nephew likes it
customer_reviews.text: I usually get the G Nephew a puzzle or brain game - STEM. But I thought I'd get this (along with a few puzzles). A pure toy, so to speak. Nothing to learn, turn off the brain and just have fun chasing the planes. He was having a lot of fun playing with something a little different than a puzzle or brain game after all the gifts had been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Grimmace

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it, but the planes don't fly well
customer_reviews.text: The kids were very enthusiastic to play with this, and they still enjoy it. But I find the planes do not fly very well. The orange "glider" plane in particular just does not glide, but instead has an erratic behavior. I tried slightly bending the foam wings to adjust the behavior, without success. The plane doing loopings has been working better. The "stunt" plane is also so-so. Kids still like it and want to play with it though, so that's good. I just wish the "glider" plane would work, and generally that all planes would fly a bit further.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Rames

customer_reviews.title: Toy of Christmas Morning.
customer_reviews.text: Toy Award of Christmas Morning, they both (7 & 4) ran out to play with it in the rain, after trying it in the hall, havent stopped talking about it since. Could have a less slippery and oddly shaped air pedal. The rockets don't fly too high unless you are in an open field with some wind. Very great idea and great directional tool in it. Still playing with it almost a year later, lots of attention when we bring it to play with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Justyna A.

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy this. I hope they’ll play with it enough to get our moneys worth. They like that these rockets do tricks. They definitely do not glide 100 feet. Even with an adult launching them, they glide maybe 20-30 feet. I feel like it would be a better value if all the rocket styles worked on the same launcher. I thought they did, so I ordered a refill pack of the extreme rockets, which do not work on this launcher.
customer_reviews.author: ATau

customer_reviews.title: Very fun toy, but issue with wing breakage like previous products
customer_reviews.text: Much more fun than the rockets, however, we’ve already lost a wing on one of the planes and there are no replacements. We had the same issue with the rocket set, eventually losing all of the wings because they are foam and a bit flimsy. It would be great if they offered a replacement set of just the planes because I see this as an issue with the foam products. The base though has been vastly improved over older products and is much much sturdier. Our rocket launcher base would constantly break and had to be taped up, but this seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: R. Earl

customer_reviews.title: He liked this one more
customer_reviews.text: Bought this, and the Original Stomp Rocket, for my 6-year-old nephew. He liked this one more, but struggled with getting some of them to launch because the rockets were a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Desa Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: great gift for 4-10 yr olds
customer_reviews.text: My foster kids, ages 4 and 5, love this. Goes together in a couple of clicks, so super easy to 'assemble' if you call it that. Styrofoam plane rocket- things are a little flimsy but I think you can buy replacements and you can use glue to fix when too much wear and tear occurs. Be careful when using near rooftops as it is easy for these to land on them and window sills, if you're lucky a good wind will blow them off. Great inexpensive gift that will have kids entertained for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: KrisAz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match performance as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Only flies 8-15 feet, doing a loop landing 10-15 feet away - Not the advertised. "Looper plane performs giant loops, glider plane soars up to 100 feet and Wildcat plane does all kinds of crazy tricks" I would love to know the University the designers attended... "designed by aeronautical engineers to perform a variety of amazing stunts" Perhaps the rocket package, which is 2/3 the cost of this package, may work better.
customer_reviews.author: scott d

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun set! Works great at a park and/or a very wide open space because these rockets get some air! We’ve lost quite a few over the fence in the backyard, but always give up hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: SarahMc

customer_reviews.title: Rockets for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my kids (10 & 7) as well as to use for my class of 4s & 5s when the “bigger” kids where making soda bottle rockets. This was a huge hit. Everyone was able to “stomp” & launch! I don’t know if they totally got the shapes of the wings changing the flight. But my kids totally did & would discuss if more force would make Each behavior different. So it was exactly what our science lesson needed. & now it’s a super fun toy that periodically ends op on the roof !!
customer_reviews.author: Mom6Phil36

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these! Played with in the driveway they are a magnet for neighborhood kids to come by. Ages 2-9 were all having a blast with them. The base is a much better quality than our old base and with the upgrade because the kids can load it independently without it ripping over. The old stomp rockets also work with this plane set. They all prefer the planes because they can try to catch them and surprise eachother with which way they go.
customer_reviews.author: jmwz23

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for active and outdoor children
customer_reviews.text: This is for: The Original Stomp Rocket Stunt Planes - 3 Foam Plane Toys I got this gift for my grandson who turned 4 in the spring. I have gotten video after video of my grandbabies playing with this thing. Their mother like for them to be active and spend time outside every day, and this filled the bill. Her in-laws requested, and I provided, a link to get one for her children after all the kids played with it at the birthday party. I feel like this is one of the best gifts I've ever given. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ley

customer_reviews.title: The kid loves these
customer_reviews.text: The kid we gave these to is like a bull in a china shop. He broke most of his birthday toys within the first hour or two of opening them...but not these. He loves them. And a week later, they're still not broken and he's still loving them so: we won. He's learning about physics, too (if you bend the wings the trajectories of the planes change, etc.). So that's a nice added bonus, right? Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hallsten

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids..but no refills of planed if lost
customer_reviews.text: Liked the toy but if doing it in s small backyard easy to lose.. only to be played in a large outdoor setting and they don't sell replacement..can't recommend for this reason
customer_reviews.author: Mcyacw

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit With Our 4 Year Old Niece
customer_reviews.text: Stomp rockets have been around a while, but they are still a great option for young kids. Parents love them too because they get the kids away from TV and computer screens and outdoors to play. We got this as a birthday gift for our 4 year old niece, and she was plenty old enough to use it safely and have fun with it. It's true that the planes are a bit flimsy, but don't worry. All our grandkids have played with this toy and by the time the planes fall apart, the kids have moved on to the next thing anyway. Lots of fun for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cappuccino Girl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old great nephew....he and his cousins played with them all afternoon!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hines

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good purchase. Very lightweight. Kids really enjoyed it and so far it’s held up without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: ... friends sons who are 10 & 6 and they LOVED it. They were playing with these for over ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to take a gift to my friends sons who are 10 & 6 and they LOVED it. They were playing with these for over an hour,
customer_reviews.author: auntylizzy

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband saw this while browsing for gifts for our 6 year old for his birthday. Our kids love being outside and we were looking for things that they could play with outside. This totally fit the bill. All three of ours kids took turns playing and launching rockets for a couple of hours. They were able to launch the rockets both on cement and in the yard. They really did have to stomp and even jump on the launcher to shoot the rockets, for them that just added to the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Alivia C Maus

customer_reviews.title: These stunt planes won’t last - not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These stomp rocket stunt planes are fun but the wings fell off after a few uses. The durability is poor compared to the standard rockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old fun
customer_reviews.text: birthday present for our 3 year old! he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Considering what came in the box, $30 was a tad higher than I would have liked to pay. I think the product is realistically worth $20. OTHERWISE, my son had so much fun with it. It's definitely the type of toy we'll be taking to the park in summer. Also, it was super simple to put together. Extra points for that :]
customer_reviews.author: Teena

customer_reviews.title: Fun but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The planes are easily damaged or get stuck way up in a tree, and I can't find where to buy replacements.
customer_reviews.author: bow99

customer_reviews.title: What a good combination. Slight danger with a flying object and ...
customer_reviews.text: What a good combination. Slight danger with a flying object and you get to jump on it. Grandsons loved it. It is safe enough to play in the house if you aim it carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Tn Gran

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these looked fun but was still kind of on the fence about them! So glad we took the plunge on these!! My kids (7,4,3) love these and they have been a huge hit!! Got our moneys worth already!! Great outside toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy

customer_reviews.title: Love, love this toy. And so did my five-year-old grandson!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this toy. I gave it to my five-year-old grandson for Christmas. He immediately hooked it up took it outside and began jumping on it. His older brother and sister wanted to join in also. The whole family loved it. I definitely recommend this toy, especially as a gift. Your kid will love you for it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Crabby Girl

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining, but not a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to put together. Pieces are cheap plastic though-didn’t think the quality of the product is worth the price. My Godson DID enjoy playing with it. He’s 5 and on the younger edge of the age range for this toy. He had a hard time stomping hard enough on the rocket launcher so the rockets only flew a few feet in the air before falling down. It kept him busy for a while though
customer_reviews.author: Heather Z

customer_reviews.title: Stomp rocket
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loved this! It was worth seeing his giggles and laughed he got out of it. A lot of fun with him Dad playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: fun for all
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my oldest son. He is always love rockets and things that fly. We took this on a family vacation and had a lot of fun with it. We enjoyed experimenting with a different rockets and seeing how the flu. Occasionally they would get stuck on the roof and that created a whole new adventure. We enjoyed flying he’s outside and being away from TVs and other screen!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaS

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, cheap quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping after we bought for my son's birthday and it didn't survive the 5 days. Super fun toy that was played with a lot but the rockets just are not good quality. The wings tear off with regular, careful play which is really disappointing considering how much fun this toy is overall.
customer_reviews.author: April D.

customer_reviews.title: My 3yo loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: Rocket launches all the time. Works with other stomp rocket rockets so you can get this one (which has the nice durable stand) and get the other rockets. Lots of them. they will get lost and abused so just get more rockets. they are like Nerf darts, you will need more. But it is totally worth it and loads of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Robbio7

customer_reviews.title: Gift that keeps them entertained for long time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 5 year old boy and he loved it. The rockets can go fairly high/far if you put enough force into it so have some space (like a park). Everything is pretty safe and it's easy to use. Quality is not amazing as you would expect, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: What a blast
customer_reviews.text: We had a blast with this durning Christmas Day Very fun for children or adults But maybe tell the kids no aiming the Rockets at nobody lol But I’m sure if you buy this for your child they will love it and the parents will enjoy watching them
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Cannon-Torres

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson for his 6th birthday. He loves it! His little sister, who is 4, even tried to sneak outside to play with it at bedtime. I heard my son-in-law even played with it when the kids were finished. This got them all outside as a family and off tech toys, so I call that a win!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Kimball

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lot of fun and easy to use-you just need some space to use it in.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old grandson. It literally takes seconds to put together—he can do it himself. He really likes it. The rockets don’t feel particularly sturdy as they appear to be made of styrofoam, but so far so good, and he is enjoying it. I think as long as it’s used properly, it should last for a while-/and you can order replacements or additional ones, I think .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for children
customer_reviews.text: This turned into a major hit for my nephew for his birthday. He and his brother are stilling getting kicks out of making the planes fly. I have been asked to see if I can buy more items for the "stomper". Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie F. DeLeo

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 year old grandson but ended up giving them to my 2 year old grandson because they were a little simplistic for the 7year old.
customer_reviews.author: bjbsipe

customer_reviews.title: A hit for a 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old grandson has loves anything 'transportation' and has lots and lots of cars and trucks. We were looking for something different for his birthday and stumbled on to Stomp Rocket. We liked the idea and price so took a chance and ordered one. It was an instant hit! It was easy to assemble and our grandson was able to put the planes on the Stomp Rocket and launch them in to flight the very first try. Since they are made of nerf-like material there is no worry if one hits an innocent bystander! Great toy for outside play for children of all ages. Even these grandparents!
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: Fun but falls a little short
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old grandson really enjoyed the rockets. The Wildcat is the best one. With adult stomping power, the best flights with a little help from the wind are around 50' or less. All in all okay, but 100' flights are not possible.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL, Grandchildren Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Every age that tried this (age 3 to 60+) loved this. It really works well!! We had to help the little one stomp a little harder, but she got the hang of it and her older brothers cheered hers on even when they only went 10' high. The rest of us could launch them--idk, maybe 50 ?--feet in the air. A lot of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old son for Christmas. He loves it. Does exactly what it was supposed to do. I honestly thought the rockets would go higher and longer distance but I am glad they do not. I was worried they would end up over the neighbor's fence.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Cooler than we thought
customer_reviews.text: We had bought a similar product from a different company a few years ago and it was kind of a let down. This one was actually pretty awesome! My 7 year old LOVES it and has been playing with it non-stop. Easy for him to use, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Always a blast!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun toy, especially for aggressive boys. Girls live it too of course! All ages - little year olds pop them up only a little bit but still lots of giggles. Trick for little stompers though - don’t push the rocket all the way down on the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Paradis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift, and Sleep Aid for Kids (HAHA)
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this toy! He turned 7 years old, and I knew he would love it. He shares it with his younger sisters, and his parents are grateful because it definitely helps prepare them for bed haha. I would definitely recommend this for all active kids!
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: One of those toys you know is going in the trash within a week of the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fun for a day or two before it falls apart very similiar to a Happy Meal toy in that regard. It didn't hold up too well but in the makers defense my kids are young and can be rough with toys. They had fun and the rocket went higher than I expected but my 2 year old tore the wings off like nothing and after heavy rain or two these things were trash
customer_reviews.author: Wes V.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for a party with many kids and they played most of the day shooting the rockets in the air. Did not get bored at all. 3 rockets come with the purchase and each one has a different function.
customer_reviews.author: Nielubie

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: These all work like advertised. Have several stomp rockets sets and these are cool. Somethi ng different than your typical rocket launcher. Very cool...and the stand is much better and more stable than previous design.
customer_reviews.author: goodfella77

customer_reviews.title: does not go 100 ft
customer_reviews.text: my youngest son who is 5 loves it , but my oldest son who is 11 does not. it barely even get in the air, and the tricks that it says is does , does not have enough room from the ground to do anything, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fun Outside Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our younger kids love this! (I'm not sure older kids would find it super amusing, but it's fun for our 3, 7 and 10 year olds to play with at the park.) It's something different and they've had a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mommmma

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GIFT!!! Bought this for a 5 and 8 year old and they couldn't stop playing! Easy Set up!!!
customer_reviews.text: These stunt planes are Awesome!!! I bought this as a birthday gift for a five year old. He and his eight year old brother had the best time and thought it was the coolest gift. The set up literally took seconds. The three planes all fly differently and do different tricks. They played with this for a few hours and only stopped because it was dark outside. Make sure wherever you set this up that there is plenty of space to play. Some of these planes seemed to go as far as 20 yards!! I highly recommend this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (and I) have a blast with these airplanes! They’re definitely keeping us busy during quarantine. I wouldn’t let your littles put the wings in, my youngest (7) tried putting the wings in and broke off a corner. I guess you can’t expect much from a styrofoam plane. Surprisingly, it still flies great!! So 5 stars because it entertains for hours and can handle some rough kiddos!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Best present!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's 5th birthday. Unexpectedly, it's his favorite present. The rockets get a decent amount of fly time and he loves chasing them. The bright colors help distinguish the rocket from the tree/bush that it could land in.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy - kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a birthday present to my friend's son. He loved it ... he plays with it all day long. He plays with it along with his friends and even with his father. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good design/quality/function, age appropriate fun, inexpensive, enduring interest based on variety.
customer_reviews.text: Without exaggeration, this was my best toy purchase off Amazon to date. Hours of independent outside fun for my 5, 7.5, and 10 year old girls. Sturdy and durable parts. Three planes included with 3 significantly differing flight patterns: straight distance glider, looping, or unpredictable spins. Try distance competitions and creative tricks based on adjustable trajectory of the launch smasher. Just don't forget to use them in wide open spaces to avoid rooftops and trees!
customer_reviews.author: Gregorino

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. Comes with 3 rockets! 5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: dmc

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: These rockets are super fun! The only thing is that the rockets themselves are easy to break. I'm sure you can find replacements, but remind the kiddos to be careful. They go pretty far. My three kids, aged 2, 5, and 10 all love it! We ended up losing one on the roof but it blew down the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old loves it easy to play with foam pieces won’t break anything
customer_reviews.author: Gin Lucadamo

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, neither worked.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my kids to play with. Neither of them worked. The tube that fits onto the rocket does not fit properly. So, air does not make it through to the rocket to launch it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old love this. So much fun and everyone including adults got into this. The rockets are soft so we even played in the house (high ceilings). I like that you can purchase replaceable rockets too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Such a silly, simple toy, but my kids spend so much time playing with it. Watch out because these planes go all over the place. Best to play with it in a wide, open space (like a yard or park). Definitely going to give this as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Mb126

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for kids of all ages. The adults had just as much fun as the kids. Best if used in a fairly wide open space as rockets can land on the roof or in your neighbors yard. We have both Stomp Rocket and Super Stomp Rocket. They are fairly sturdy and we have used them a lot. We have also given them as birthday gifts and received rave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mollyb

customer_reviews.title: The boys love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my godson. He loves anything that flies and, being a young boy, loves running after the planes. His parents enjoy wearing the boys out. Everybody wins.
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for non-electronic toys for our 3 and 7 year old kids. This one turned out to be extremely good for the price and the two kids had a blast using this.. Very easy to assemble and assures hours of fun. Can be used indoors and outdoors. This toy turned out to be more fun than we had expected!
customer_reviews.author: Ramnath V Iyer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First package came w/o stand for rockets. Ordered a second one after asking for return of the first one. Stand was constantly falling down and not keeping rockets up. To top it off, none of the rockets flew more than a few feet and always in a circle. Way different from my son’s neighborhood friend who had a slightly different version that would fly 30-40 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the kids for Christmas and it's still their favorite thing to bring to the park. I'm actually about to buy a 2nd one because we've lost 2 rockets on the roof and I dont think you can buy replacements separately. I'm sure they wouldn't mind having two of them, more to share!
customer_reviews.author: Megan G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids absolutely love this. I like to give gifts that promote outdoor physical activity. They love this and play with it for hours. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Muniac

customer_reviews.title: It's fun!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is that it takes some weight to make it go high. My hefty 3 year old couldn't quite get it to go high but I sure did!! Up to the roof! So fun!
customer_reviews.author: KatMatt

customer_reviews.title: The wheel gets misalign
customer_reviews.text: After riding for a few minutes on the sidewalk the wheel will get misaligned. I will have to straighten it before continuing. I tried to tighten the screws but it doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: moviefanatic645

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: This is great and my 3yr old son loves it. As long as you don’t push the rocket all the way down it’s easier for the little ones like my son to the stomp on it.
customer_reviews.author: chantal

customer_reviews.title: Inside or out, great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 9 year old love these rockets. We had one similar a couple of years ago and the end of the rockets got worn out and the device you step on busted. This one seems like it is built a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Howard M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, simple toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved these. We went outside immediately and started playing with them. Even though we didn’t get the flight length promised in the descriptions of each rocket, they were still a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fun planes
customer_reviews.text: They don't do much for stunts, the original stomp rocket is much more fun for the kids (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.author: Denise E. Seisler

customer_reviews.title: Box was torn and opened
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew as birthday gift but box was torn and opened. It didn’t look like a new item. I did not have time for a return. So disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANNE LIN

customer_reviews.title: Fun, exciting toy. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun, great kids party activity. My two granddaughters love running and jumping to launch the rockets. Fun, exciting toy. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: pilotSteve

customer_reviews.title: These are great and lots of fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: These are great and lots of fun for everyone, young and old. The service was fast, many thanks, highly recommend. A+ A+ A+ A+ A+
customer_reviews.author: Helen C. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Toddler loved his birthday gift! He’s in a science phase at the moment and these little rockets were perfect. I love how you have to stomp ... we need more games like these to give our children a reason to play outside rather than watch tv or play video games
customer_reviews.author: MALL

customer_reviews.title: Short lived fun.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic box that you stomp will not survive repeated daily use especially if a child turns it upside down. The three planes/jets do not fly as stated on box even at different angles and with/without wind.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Height not attained
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my out of state grandson for his birthday This month. I was told the rockets didn’t go anywhere close to the 50 feet indicated on the package. I am unable to return. Such a disappointment for the money. The original stomp rocket was better.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use this toy to close to roads. The glider can go a distance if set up properly.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 6 year old grandson for his birthday. It was a hit immediately and my grandson set it up without any help. The three planes are foam so they are not overly sturdy, but with practice they loop, go straight up and another is a glider. This is an action toy, best if used running then stomping, even just a stomp sends the planes off. Would definitely buy again. Even adults and a teenage sister had fun with this!
customer_reviews.author: melanie shinn

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, but comparable to the cost. Kids love it, and it hasn't broken yet even though it feels cheap. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Team J-Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for two separate nephews in two separate states. One is 5 and the other 8 and it was a big hit with both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Welch

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: Little boy loves it. two of the rockets don't shoot off great but the one that does is a lot of fun. Used multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Ray Taylor

customer_reviews.title: quality not there
customer_reviews.text: This product was not up to standard. Only one plane will fly descent. It was way too much money for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret buying this!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old Godson and he LOVED it, it was definitely a hit as he cant stop playing with it. I would suggest purchasing additional rockets with it because they go pretty high and can get lost easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michae'l

customer_reviews.title: such fun!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great fun because it is far away from all the digital toys kids play with now days; my grandson and his friend played with this for hours in the back yard (they are 5) and could never seem to get enough of the directions the planes flew and loop the planes took. I would highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: PAK

product_meta.title: The Original Stomp Rocket Stunt Planes - 3 Foam Plane Toys for Boys and Girls - Outdoor Rocket Toy Gift for Ages 5 (6, 7, 8) and Up
product_meta.description: Run, jump and stomp to launch stunt planes! includes three different planes designed by aeronautical engineers to perform a variety of amazing stunts. Looped plane performs giant loops, glider plane soars up to 100 feet and Wildcat plane performs all kinds of crazy tricks! adjust the angle of flight with the adjustable launch stand, fly into a head wind or with a tail wind, and more to change how these stunt planes fly!
feature_bullets: Run, jump and stomp to launch Stunt Planes; 100% kid-powered. No batteries required. Great for year round fun to get kids away from screen time and play with outdoor toys. These air rocket launchers are the perfect toddler toys for girls and boys ages 5 and up.

Includes 3 Stunt Planes (Looper, Glider and Wildcat), a sturdy adjustable air rocket launch stand and launch stomp pad with an air hose. Looper plane performs giant loops, glider plane soars up to 100 feet and Wildcat plane does all kinds of crazy tricks.
Adjust the angle of flight with the adjustable launch stand, fly into or with the wind and change how these planes fly.
Award-winning products from industry experts, including iParenting Media, Dr. Toy, and Creative Child Magazine

Pair with Stomp Rocket Science book and get kids interested in STEM subjects (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math) early. These toy rocket launchers are perfect STEM toys that are fun and get your kids up and moving while they learn.
